nodes.text: Bank Niro Eleven was a bank on the moon Niro 11. It had a reputation for having bank accounts for the fabulously rich and a great deal of privacy about those accounts. The manager of new accounts was Herk Bloomi.
In 18 BBY the bank was visited by Clive Flax and Astri Oddo, who were hoping to find information about Eve Yarrow. The bank was subsequently visited by stormtroopers looking to arrest the two.
